actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: To require cigarette products to be placed under or behind the counter in retail sales.

summary.text: Requires anyone engaged in the retail sales of cigarette products to place such products under or behind a counter and not out on the floor of the sales facility. Deems noncompliance to be a violation of the Federal Trade Commission Act prohibition against deceptive acts or practices.

titles.title: To require cigarette products to be placed under or behind the counter in retail sales.
